inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent by patient prior to initiation of any study-mandated procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female patients > 40 years with atrial septal defect type secundum and > 40 years of age at the time of repair
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must have a negative pre-treatment pregnancy test and must use a reliable method of contraception during study treatment and for at least 3 months after study treatment termination.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Women not of childbearing potential are defined as postmenopausal (amenorrhea for at least 1 year), or documented surgically or naturally sterile.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Significant valvular diseases, other than tricuspid or pulmonary regurgitation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Chronic lung disease or total lung capacity < 80% of predicted value
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing age who are sexually active without practising reliable methods of contraception
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has atrial septal defect type secundum, chronic lung disease, and history of significant pulmonary embolism. However, they have tolerated an inpatient trial of sildenafil without hypotension.
